name: Knight’s Protection
description:
Eleanor receives a defense buff dependent on how many damaged allies are around her (Range of 3).
•  1 Damaged Ally: +1 DEF
•  3 Damaged Allies: +3 DEF
•  5 Damaged Allies: +6 DEF
Additionally, if a nearby ally drops to ⅓ HP, enemies will target and attack her if they are able to do so once per instance of HP drop. After that, she will need to use her action in order to prolong this protection.
